title: Belt
description: black; 9-3/4\" ends of belt have handstitched 2-3/4\" and 3-1/4\" bands of geometric embroidered design, one end on black, one on tan; 1\" embroidered flame design hems; red, green, orange, pink, purple, tan, black
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
